projects.title: Memory Game
projects.description: An enjoyable card flip memory game for children to play and learn matching from memory. This game can help users with attention, concentration, focus, and overall memory health. Some key features include keeping a card hidden unless hovered to help with user memory and saving the user name and score into local storage to display on the scoreboard. We used HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and DOM Manipulation to build our project and ensured proper gitflow to GitHub to store our project.

projects.title: Odd Duck
projects.description: Created a voting poll of 25 total votes for a company with clickable images and  a bar chart of results after voting. :)
